Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.io

Interface FileStreamSupport

All Known Subinterfaces:
InputStreamProvider.FileInputStreamProvider, OutputStreamProvider.FileOutputStreamProvider
public interface FileStreamSupport
Defines all file/directory accessibility tests one may wish to perform when reading from or writing to files or folders.
Author:
Benjamin Lawry (bjlawry@sandia.gov) created on 08/04/2023

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    canExecute(File file)

  • Method Details

    • getMetadata

      default byte getMetadata(File file) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      file - to get metadata for
      Returns:
      a byte that can be decoded using the FileAttributes enum type
      Throws:
      IOException - may be thrown in the event of a network problem during the call

    • listFiles

      default File[] listFiles(File directory) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      directory - folder to list first-level contents for
      Returns:
      an array of all first-level files contained by the specified directory (non-recursive)
      Throws:
      IOException - may be thrown in the event of a network problem during the call

    • exists

      default boolean exists(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.EXISTS.test(getMetadata(file)).
      Parameters:
      file - file to test existence of
      Returns:
      true if the file exists
      Throws:
      IOException

    • isFile

      default boolean isFile(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.IS_FILE.test(getMetadata(file))
      Parameters:
      file - reference to test
      Returns:
      true if the file exists and is not a directory
      Throws:
      IOException

    • isDirectory

      default boolean isDirectory(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.IS_DIRECTORY.test(getMetadata(file))
      Parameters:
      file - reference to test
      Returns:
      true if the file exists and is a directory (not a file)
      Throws:
      IOException

    • canRead

      default boolean canRead(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.READABLE.test(getMetadata(file))
      Parameters:
      file - reference to test
      Returns:
      true if the file/directory is readable with the current user permissions
      Throws:
      IOException

    • canWrite

      default boolean canWrite(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.WRITEABLE.test(getMetadata(file))
      Parameters:
      file - reference to test
      Returns:
      true if the file/directory is writeable with the current user permissions
      Throws:
      IOException

    • canExecute

      default boolean canExecute(File file) throws IOException
      Equivalent to calling FileAttributes.EXECUTABLE.test(getMetadata(file))
      Parameters:
      file - reference to test
      Returns:
      true if the file/directory is executable
      Throws:
      IOException
